issue.title: [CF 1207] Track dot's strength.
issue.body:
Hi. How can i track the number X which deals my flame shock per Y seconds so i can use it as condition? Just turnin "aura variable" on gives me just "1" number, thats all.


> Posted by CurseForge user Ckotuna | Imported from CurseForge issue #1207 | Raw

comments.body:
After a bit too much considering and debating, I've brought the old Tooltip Scan conditions from 2011 back in 04d6d18. They're much improved over the way that they used to work, so performance shouldn't be nearly as big a concern as it used to be.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
